from: I like watching Sasha Grey.
to: Rád se dívám na Sashu Greyovou.

from: I trekked druing the storm even though they warned me not to.
to: Vyrazil jsem na bouři, i když mě varovali, abych to nedělal.

from: I was hoping we could move to the intimate stuff already.
to: Doufal jsem, že už bychom se mohli přesunout k intimním věcem.

from: I always wanted to be as strong as Hercules.
to: Vždycky jsem chtěl být tak silný jako Herkules.

from: I would never make a decision based on my emotions.
to: Nikdy bych se nerozhodoval na základě svých emocí.

from: I sometimes have to remind myself not to jump to conclusions.

from: I always feel bad after an argument.

from: I like nice clothes.

from: I need to find a job in services because I like human contact.

from: I am sure about my abilities.

from: I'm not as stupid as they think I am.

from: I was the lead author of the research paper.
to: Byl jsem hlavním autorem výzkumné práce.

from: After walking into the meeting room, I shook everyone's hand.

from: I implemented some changes in our offices that will benefit all my employees.

from: People around me know that if they need something, I'm happy to help.

from: I wouldn't be satisfied with myself if I didn't finish the race.

from: I had to shave my legs before the race.
to: Před závodem jsem si musel oholit nohy.

from: I didn't make any hasty mistakes.

from: I thought therapy was for weak people.
to: Myslel jsem, že terapie je pro slabé lidi.

from: I wish I had passed the physical test!
to: Přál bych si, abych prošel fyzickým testem!

from: I shouldn't argue, because it's better to keep the household calm.
to: Neměl bych se hádat, protože je lepší udržet domácnost v klidu.

from: I always made sure that my partners favourite snacks were in the cupboard.

from: I made sure the dough was the perfect temperature.
to: Ujistil jsem se, že těsto má perfektní teplotu.

from: I got a fine for speeding on the highway.
to: Dostal jsem pokutu za překročení rychlosti na dálnici.

from: I was so horny I almost could not control myself when we finally ended up in the bed with my crush.

from: People would often turn to me for fashion and style advice, recognizing my good taste and sense of aesthetics so I knew I was appreciated.
to: Lidé se na mě často obraceli pro radu ohledně módy a stylu, uznávali můj dobrý vkus a smysl pro estetiku, takže jsem věděl, že jsem oceněn.

from: I'm too experienced to waste my time here.

to: Jsem horník.

from: When I'm with him, I'm angry.

from: I told them to let me buy them the things they needed.

from: I'm always ready to help you with anything around your car.

from: When was the last time you had sex?

from: I'm good at navigating.
to: Jsem dobrý v navigaci.

from: I observed them to see whether they were satisfied with the meal I made.

from: I avoided conflicts at all costs.

from: I felt a rush of desire as I was kissed and immediately felt aroused.

from: I offered my help with doing the dishes.
to: Nabídl jsem pomoc s mytím nádobí.

to: Zapnul jsem pračku.

from: I checked if the children did their homework.
to: Zkontroloval jsem, jestli děti dělají domácí úkoly.

from: I always had authority and others naturally saw me as a leader.
to: Vždy jsem měl autoritu a ostatní mě přirozeně považovali za vůdce.

from: I have always wanted to behave as they expected me to.
to: Vždy jsem se chtěl chovat tak, jak ode mě očekávali.

from: I helped the neighbour with carrying her shopping bags.
to: Pomohl jsem sousedovi s nošením nákupních tašek.

from: I'm exhausted from explaining to you that you can't buy a new phone because I didn't earn much this month.

from: I could not stop thinking about the sex we had last night.
to: Nemohl jsem přestat myslet na sex, který jsme měli včera v noci.

from: I don't like watching videos of abandoned puppies, it makes me cry.

from: I had cameras installed around the house so nothing would happen to me.
to: Po domě jsem měl nainstalované kamery, aby se mi nic nestalo.

from: We won the competition thanks to the idea I had a month ago.
to: Soutěž jsme vyhráli díky myšlence, kterou jsem měl před měsícem.

from: I didn't want my partner to work.
to: Nechtěl jsem, aby můj partner pracoval.

from: Although I don't like this dish, I made it for my family.
to: I když se mi toto jídlo nelíbí, udělal jsem ho pro svou rodinu.

from: I always took taking care of my family's finances seriously.
to: Vždy jsem se staral o finance své rodiny vážně.

from: I managed my team with ease and got the job done.
to: Snadno jsem řídil svůj tým a dokončil práci.

from: Maybe if I acted nicer they would say yes.
to: Možná, že kdybych se choval hezky, řekli by ano.

from: They were rude so I had to punch them.
to: Byli hrubí, takže jsem je musel praštit.

from: My core strength is still very good because I go to gym three times a week.
to: Moje základní síla je stále velmi dobrá, protože chodím do posilovny třikrát týdně.

from: When someone calls me to go out, I'm always happy to say yes.
to: Když mi někdo zavolá, abych šel ven, vždy rád řeknu ano.

from: I fired everyone who made me angry.
to: Vyhodil jsem každého, kdo mě naštval.

from: They think I'm shy, but I just don't want to embarrass myself.
to: Myslí si, že jsem plachý, ale nechci se ztrapnit.

from: I am sure there is a higher power controlling my life.
to: Jsem si jistý, že existuje vyšší síla, která ovládá můj život.

from: I tried to lift the piano, but I couldn't.
to: Snažil jsem se zvednout klavír, ale nemohl jsem.

from: This problem turned out to be too difficult and I got furious.
to: Ukázalo se, že tento problém byl příliš obtížný a já jsem zuřil.

from: I almost started crying.

from: I sacrificed my own authenticity to avoid displeasing others.

from: I took them to a water park.
to: Vzal jsem je do aquaparku.

from: I knew that I'm capable of more, but I have family, so my priorities changed.

from: I was never so sure about my test results.
to: Nikdy jsem si nebyl tak jistý výsledky svých testů.

from: My to do list was neverending but I kept going.

from: I offered a supportive ear and understanding without judgment.
to: Nabídl jsem podpůrné ucho a porozumění bez úsudku.

from: I like to have fun.
to: Rád se bavím.

from: I hated logic because it often wasn't romantic.

from: I invited my friends to my place to have a dinner.
to: Pozval jsem své přátele k sobě na večeři.

from: My GP referred me to a very good ophtalmologist because my eyesight was getting poor recently.

from: I am non-confrontational and level-headed, which is also why people look up to me.
to: Jsem nekonfrontační a vyrovnaný, což je také důvod, proč ke mně lidé vzhlížejí.

from: My friend told me that I overreacted.
to: Můj přítel mi řekl, že jsem přehnal.

from: I negotiated with service providers such as internet or cable companies to secure the most cost-effective plans.
to: Vyjednával jsem s poskytovateli služeb, jako jsou internetové nebo kabelové společnosti, abych zajistil nákladově nejefektivnější plány.

from: I am courageous.
to: Jsem odvážný.

from: I had a really nice face when I was young.
to: Když jsem byl mladý, měl jsem opravdu pěknou tvář.

from: I can't imagine having a family and having to take care of them someday.

from: I joined a self-defence course.
to: Zapojil jsem se na kurz sebeobrany.

from: I didn't want to stay at home with kids because I would loose a really good job.

from: If only I could call and check how they are doing.

from: When I'm sad, I go shopping.

from: When I was their age, I behaved like a child too.

from: I could easily join the army.
to: Mohl bych snadno vstoupit do armády.

from: There is so much going on inside my mind, I can barely focus.

to: Chtěl jsem, aby se cítil vítán.

from: I weightlifted a lot during my college years and it still shows although I am 40 years old.

from: I like curved bodies.
to: Mám rád zakřivená těla.

from: I didn't know what to do, so I relied on my gut.

from: I have never believed in superstitions.

from: I've been told that I'm a true professional – always focused, organized, and get the job done efficiently.

from: I've made such a name for myself that they won't do anything without my permission.

from: I don't think I have a strong enough character to be a company director.

from: I don't like gossiping, it's a waste of time.

from: They say I'm insensitive, but I call it sensible.

from: I encouraged teamwork and collaboration during group projects.

from: I am an accomplished writer, my books are usually bestsellers.

from: I didn't have any hobbies, I was working all the time, so I could make more money for my family.

from: I organized my to-do list based on priority, tackling the most important tasks first.

from: I still think about how I was told I was ugly in elementary school.

from: To avoid losing anything, I prefer to back up all my data.

from: I was sick but I still worked from home so we don't loose any money.

from: I gave up the calculus class, it was just too hard for me.

from: I calculated our spendings to budget properly.

from: People think of me as a wimp just because I'm good to others.

from: In order not to burn out, I try to create a work-life balance.

from: With a steady hand and unwavering focus, I approached the edge of the cliff.

from: I learned a foreign launguage to have better foreign contacts.

from: I hated my body.

from: I had never thought that I could come to harm.

from: I wanted to go to that party, but nobody wanted to come with me.

from: I never lost my temper.
to: Nikdy jsem neztratil nervy.

from: I didn't want to tell them what is wrong because I didn't want to cause any trouble.

from: I was not able to complete the excercise because I am too exhausted.

from: I didn't even consider the possibility that I would fail.

from: I was skating before I could even walk.
to: Bruslela jsem ještě dřív, než jsem mohla chodit.

from: They do not dare to questions the decisions that I have made.
to: Neodvažují se zpochybňovat rozhodnutí, která jsem učinil.

from: I made a group chat for all the new classmates.
to: Udělal jsem skupinový chat pro všechny nové spolužáky.

from: I carefully proofread and edited my written assignments before submitting them.

from: I had already made up my mind, so your argument will not work.
to: Už jsem se rozhodl, takže váš argument nebude fungovat.

from: When I'm out with my friend we gossip way too much.
to: Když jsem venku se svým přítelem, moc drbeme.

from: I can take this - I have always managed.
to: Můžu to vzít - vždy jsem to zvládl.

from: I went volunteering to Africa.
to: Šel jsem dobrovolně do Afriky.

from: I realised that children are individual creatures that I cannot shape based on my ideas and desires.
to: Uvědomil jsem si, že děti jsou individuální tvorové, které nemohu formovat na základě svých představ a tužeb.

from: I'm successful.
to: Jsem úspěšný.

from: I knew how to fix a broken car.
to: Věděl jsem, jak opravit rozbité auto.

from: I have decided that I will praise at least one person every day.

from: I like to inspire my subordinates on a daily basis.
to: Rád inspiruji své podřízené každý den.

from: Their suffering touched me - I wanted to comfort them.
to: Jejich utrpení se mě dotklo - chtěl jsem je utěšit.

from: I calmly addressed a conflict with a colleague.
to: Klidně jsem řešil konflikt s kolegou.

from: I helped you change the tyres on your car because I'm stronger.

to: Rád pomáhám lidem.

from: I polished the cutlery until it was spotless.

from: I tried to be kind at all costs not to displease anyone.

from: I won the marathon last year.
to: Minulý rok jsem vyhrál maraton.

from: My good looks opened doors in the entertainment industry, I was very confident.
to: Můj dobrý vzhled otevřel dveře v zábavním průmyslu, byl jsem velmi sebevědomý.

from: I never made my decision based on emotions.
to: Nikdy jsem se nerozhodoval na základě emocí.

from: Being the provider means being responsible for putting food on the table, so I provided.
to: Být poskytovatelem znamená být zodpovědný za položení jídla na stůl, tak jsem zajistil.

from: If it were up to me, I'd have pizza for lunch every day.
to: Kdyby to bylo na mně, měl bych pizzu na oběd každý den.

from: When danger came, I took the lead.
to: Když přišlo nebezpečí, ujal jsem se vedení.

from: I should wash the car.
to: Měl bych umýt auto.

from: The shelter held a Christmas auction where I bought a beautiful paw bracelet.

from: I volunteered at a local shelter, actively engaging with individuals experiencing homelessness, and showing empathy by providing care and support.
to: Přihlásil jsem se jako dobrovolník v místním útulku, aktivně jsem se zabýval jednotlivci, kteří zažívají bezdomovectví, a projevoval empatii poskytováním péče a podpory.

from: Kissing was important to me, but so was sex.
to: Líbání bylo pro mě důležité, ale sex také.

from: I wouldn't let anyone dictate what I should do.

from: As a human resources manager, I effectively recruited top talent, facilitated employee training and development programs.

from: I always need to get the work done right away, because if I wait until the last minute, I feel irresponsible.
to: Vždy musím dokončit práci hned, protože když počkám na poslední chvíli, cítím se nezodpovědně.

from: I know how you feel, I was in the same situation.
to: Vím, jak se cítíš, byl jsem ve stejné situaci.

from: I joined an environmental conservation group, collaborating with like-minded individuals to raise awareness and take action on environmental issues.
to: Připojil jsem se ke skupině na ochranu životního prostředí a spolupracoval s podobně smýšlejícími jednotlivci na zvyšování povědomí a přijímání opatření v otázkách životního prostředí.

from: I struggled to maintain proper posture during extended periods of sitting, feeling weak in my back and core muscles.

from: I am beautiful.
to: Jsem krásná.

from: I like to prepare snacks for my kids, so they can eat them at school.

from: I got a good job right after school and made enough money to buy a house for my family.

from: I vacuumed and spot-cleaned my carpets and rugs.

from: I regularly reviewed and adjusted our family's financial goals.

from: As a chef, I carefully sourced high-quality ingredients, honed my culinary skills, and consistently delivered delicious and beautifully presented meals.

from: I'm important to my family because I like to fulfill their needs.

from: I noticed that my good looks seemed to open doors for me.

from: I offered them help with the furniture.

from: I was well aware that I was very capable.

from: They knew I would listen to their problems and try to help.

from: I'm a good runner.
to: Jsem dobrý běžec.

from: I felt like I was the worst, I don't know why.

from: The key moment in my career was when I realize that my decision-making skills earned me respect from everyone.

from: I worked hard to provide for the family.
to: Tvrdě jsem pracoval, abych se postaral o rodinu.

from: I take pride in my work, but I'm always looking for ways to do it even better.

from: I would frequently procrastinate and avoid my responsibilities.

from: I cleaned and organized my kitchen cabinets, ensuring that items were properly stored and easily accessible.

to: Vždycky jsem s sebou nosil kondom.

from: A few years back, I worked as a miner.
to: Před několika lety jsem pracoval jako horník.

from: I could easily be in a polygamous relationship.
to: Mohl bych snadno být v polygamním vztahu.

from: It was a tough choice, but I am confident that it was right.

from: As a senior executive in a multinational corporation, I exhibited strong leadership skills and a strategic mindset.

from: I like wearing funky socks.

from: I pursued a higher-paying job opportunity to increase our family's income .

from: I consistently sought permission or validation from others before making decisions.

from: I couldn't look, it made me feel sick.
to: Nemohl jsem se dívat, bylo mi špatně.

from: I impulsively quit my job without a backup plan.
to: Impulzivně jsem opustil svou práci bez záložního plánu.

from: I got bitten by a snake but I remained calm.
to: Byl jsem kousán hadem, ale zůstal jsem klidný.

from: I rented the house for them.
to: Pronajal jsem jim dům.

from: I was elected as the new mayor of the town.
to: Byl jsem zvolen novým starostou města.

from: I signed up for a medieval swording workshop.
to: Přihlásil jsem se do středověkého sformulačního workshopu.

from: I led my team to success.
to: Vedl jsem svůj tým k úspěchu.

from: I liked the way you walked.
to: Líbilo se mi, jak jsi chodila.

from: I made a resolution not to buy leather clothes or shoes because it is insensitive to animals.
to: Rozhodl jsem se nekupovat kožené oblečení nebo boty, protože jsou necitlivé na zvířata.

from: I did what they told me to do to fit in.
to: Udělal jsem, co mi řekli, abych zapadl.

from: My boss is influential and has a significant impact on others.
to: Můj šéf je vlivný a má významný dopad na ostatní.

from: The muscles in my arms and back flexed as I rowed through the calm waters.
to: Svaly v mých pažích a zádech se ohýbaly, když jsem vesloval klidnými vodami.

from: As a software engineer, I consistently demonstrated a strong work ethic and attention to detail.
to: Jako softwarový inženýr jsem důsledně prokázal silnou pracovní morálku a pozornost k detailům.

from: I frequently deferred to others' opinions and preferences.
to: Často jsem se odklonil k názorům a preferencím ostatních.

from: It was comforting for me, that I cooked for my family.
to: Bylo pro mě uklidňující, že jsem vařil pro svou rodinu.

from: I wanted to focus on my career, family life could wait.
to: Chtěl jsem se soustředit na svou kariéru, rodinný život mohl počkat.

from: I put on this new perfume today and everyone is turning around to see me.
to: Dnes jsem si nasadil tento nový parfém a všichni se otočí, aby mě viděli.

from: I validated my friend's emotions, providing reassurance during a challenging situation.
to: Potvrdil jsem emoce svého přítele a poskytl jsem ujištění během náročné situace.

from: I bought a castle to renovate it.
to: Koupil jsem si hrad, abych ho renovoval.

from: I knew that he was acting rude, but it is just because he's had a hard time at work.
to: Věděl jsem, že se chová hrubě, ale je to jen proto, že měl těžké časy v práci.

from: It is stressful to work here at this position, but I'm good at handling it.
to: Je stresující pracovat tady na této pozici, ale umím to zvládnout.

from: I never talked about my feelings with my friends.
to: Nikdy jsem o svých pocitech nemluvil se svými přáteli.

from: I couldn't decide which shirt to buy, so I bought all three.
to: Nemohl jsem se rozhodnout, kterou košili koupit, tak jsem si koupil všechny tři.

from: I was scared because there was a spider in my shower.
to: Bál jsem se, protože ve sprše byl pavouk.

from: I thought I was the most beautiful at the event.
to: Myslel jsem, že jsem na akci nejkrásnější.

from: I was thinking about you and me having sex, what do you say?
to: Přemýšlel jsem o tom, že spolu budeme mít sex, co říkáš?

from: As a lawyer, I meticulously researched case precedents and prepared persuasive arguments for the courtroom
to: Jako právník jsem pečlivě zkoumal precedenty případů a připravil přesvědčivé argumenty pro soudní síň

from: I have to look good, even if I'm just going to take out the trash.
to: Musím vypadat dobře, i když se chystám jen vynést odpadky.

from: When they called and told me what had happened, I collapsed.
to: Když mi zavolali a řekli mi, co se stalo, zhroutil jsem se.

from: I know it's important to be alone with yourself, but I just couldn't do it.
to: Vím, že je důležité být sám se sebou, ale prostě jsem to nemohl udělat.

from: I'd like to trade football cards, but I don't have anyone to trade them with.
to: Rád bych vyměnil fotbalové karty, ale nemám s kým je vyměnit.

from: I liked to play computer games and lived in my mom's basement although I was an adult.
to: Rád jsem hrál počítačové hry a žil jsem ve sklepě mé matky, i když jsem byl dospělý.

from: I have paid a personal trainer to help me with my workouts.
to: Zaplatil jsem osobnímu trenérovi, aby mi pomohl s tréninkem.

from: I liked speaking in front of a huge audience.
to: Rád mluvím před velkým publikem.

from: I swam naked.
to: Plaval jsem nahý.

from: Taking care of my children is the least I can do for my family.
to: Péče o děti je to nejmenší, co mohu udělat pro svou rodinu.

from: I like it when the hairdresser massages my head.
to: Líbí se mi, když mi kadeřník masíruje hlavu.

from: I kept the kitchen area clean to prevent a buildup of dirty dishes
to: Udržoval jsem kuchyňský kout čistý, abych zabránil hromadění špinavého nádobí

from: I attended a photoshoot where the photographer captured my natural beauty, boosting my self-esteem.
to: Zúčastnil jsem se focení, kde fotograf zachytil mou přirozenou krásu a zvýšil mou sebeúctu.

from: With each step deeper into the haunted house, I explored its eerie corridors, unafraid of the lurking shadows.
to: S každým krokem hlouběji do strašidelného domu jsem prozkoumával jeho děsivé chodby, aniž bych se bál číhajících stínů.

from: I made coffee for everyone in our team before we started the team meeting.
to: Udělal jsem kávu pro všechny v našem týmu, než jsme zahájili týmovou schůzku.

from: I always thought that life is a game and you have to enjoy it.
to: Vždycky jsem si myslel, že život je hra a musíte si ji užít.

from: I advocated for causes and initiatives I believed in, inspiring others to join in.
to: Obhajoval jsem příčiny a iniciativy, kterým jsem věřil, a inspiroval jsem ostatní, aby se připojili.

from: I hated when my partner was washing the dishes because I knew that I could do it better.
to: Nenáviděl jsem, když můj partner myl nádobí, protože jsem věděl, že to dokážu lépe.

from: I established an emergency fund to protect my family from unexpected expenses.
to: Založil jsem pohotovostní fond, abych ochránil svou rodinu před neočekávanými výdaji.

from: My partner never truly listens to what I'm saying and I find it childish.
to: Můj partner nikdy opravdu neposlouchá, co říkám, a připadá mi to dětinské.

from: I spent hours in front of the mirror.
to: Strávil jsem hodiny před zrcadlem.

from: I wanted to make more friends.
to: Chtěl jsem získat více přátel.

from: For some reason I wasn't happy, so one day I just packed up and flew to Spain.
to: Z nějakého důvodu jsem nebyl šťastný, tak jsem jednoho dne jen sbalil a odletěl do Španělska.

from: This make no sense, I screamed.
to: To nedává smysl, křičel jsem.

from: Let me lift that for you, I wouldn't be happy if something happened to you.
to: Nech mě to pro tebe zvednout, nebyl bych rád, kdyby se ti něco stalo.

from: Let me bake the pie, I insisted.
to: Nech mě upéct koláč, trval jsem na tom.
